svg.text: Insert, Delete, Search with Step-by-Step Implementation

g.text: 4. Right child is NULL → insert 25 here
5. New node 25 added as right child of 20
Time Complexity: O(log n) average case
Case 2: Delete Node with One Child (30)
Case 3: Delete Node with Two Children (50)
1. Find inorder successor (smallest value in right subtree)
2. Replace node's value with successor's value
3. Delete the successor node (which has at most one child)
if not root or root.val == val:
Balanced BST maintains O(log n) height
